Class MetaDeviceDatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.amos2013.rfid_inventory_management_web.database.MetaDeviceDatabaseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MetaDeviceDatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used, to access the database containing the device meta data

      • getRecordByPartNumber

        public MetaDeviceDatabaseRecord getRecordByPartNumber(java.lang.String part_number)
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Searches and returns a record that match the part_number given from the local list.
        Parameters:
        part_number - the part number that is searched for
        Returns:
        the MetaDeviceDatabaseRecord that was searched for, null when nothing was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when null or more than one record is returned from the database
